name: Julia: a Science Journey (itch)
description:
Julia: a Science Journey is an adventure about viruses, society, and life choices. The story begins in 2020 as our main character lives a humdrum teenage life while she deals with high school, her family and her friends. Will you help Julia navigate through the complexities of adult life while the covid-19 pandemic changes her world forever?

Julia: ASJ is part a participatory science project aimed at improving our understanding of game-based learning dynamics. The game will record anonymous information about how you face the challenges posed by the game, so you will be contributing to a science project just by playing it.

The first episode is available for free in English, Spanish and Catalan and it runs on Windows, Mac and Linux.
